body:
Comment 1: 
IMHO the ratio of hitting this twice, in the last few years I suppose, is not enough to
introduce a (another small) irregularity into the language for saving 8 keystrokes (in
the same time span).

For reference, there seem to be only _two_ cases of the same in the stdlib:
    
- pkg/log/syslog/syslog_test.go:308
- pkg/database/sql/sql_test.go:1073

Also, there's an unknown number of existing 3rd party Go parsers which all would have to
be adjusted for this. (A smaller concern, admittedly. Not for the 3rd party maintainers,
though.)
